title: Evlilik Hakkında Her Şey
overview: The reactions and differences of four very different women from the Cevher family to their common past will be discussed. In the series where we will see all the stages of a marriage through these four female protagonists; Çolpan is divorced, Azra has been married for many years, Güneş is on the eve of marriage and Sanem completely rejects the concept of marriage. "All About Marriage", including clients' stories; will come to the screen with stories that will not hesitate to reveal the dirty order of family, love, loyalty and divorce law...
